```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from plotnine import *
```

```{python}
# read in data
trackman_910 = pd.read_csv('../data/in-game-trackman/UConnFall910.csv')
trackman_912 = pd.read_csv('../data/in-game-trackman/UConnFall912.csv')
trackman_913 = pd.read_csv('../data/in-game-trackman/UConnFall913.csv')
trackman_914 = pd.read_csv('../data/in-game-trackman/UConnFall914.csv')
```

```{python}
# concatenate datasets
trackman_fall = pd.concat([trackman_910, trackman_912, trackman_913, trackman_914])

# drop unecessary columns
unnamed_cols = [f'Unnamed: {i}' for i in range(23, 30)]
trackman_fall = trackman_fall.drop(columns = ['ExitSpeed', 'PitcherSet'])
trackman_fall = trackman_fall.drop(columns = [i for i in unnamed_cols])

trackman_fall = trackman_fall.dropna()
```

```{python}
# clean up pitch call column
trackman_fall['PitchCall'] = trackman_fall['PitchCall'].replace('Ballcalled', 'BallCalled')

trackman_fall['PitchCall'] = trackman_fall['PitchCall'].replace('CalledStrike', 'StrikeCalled')
```

```{python}
# drop unecessary/unusable columns
trackman_fall = trackman_fall.drop(columns = ['KorBB', 'TaggedHitType', 'PlayResult'])
```

```{python}
# clean up pitch type column
trackman_fall['AutoPitchType'] = trackman_fall['AutoPitchType'].replace('Slider ', 'Slider')

trackman_fall['AutoPitchType'] = trackman_fall['AutoPitchType'].replace('Fastball ', 'Fastball')

trackman_fall['AutoPitchType'] = trackman_fall['AutoPitchType'].replace('Cutter ', 'Cutter')
```

```{python}
fig, axs = plt.subplots(2, 2)

hist_1 = trackman_fall[trackman_fall['Balls'] == 0.0]['AutoPitchType']
hist_2 = trackman_fall[trackman_fall['Balls'] == 1.0]['AutoPitchType']
hist_3 = trackman_fall[trackman_fall['Balls'] == 2.0]['AutoPitchType']
hist_4 = trackman_fall[trackman_fall['Balls'] == 3.0]['AutoPitchType']

axs[0, 0].hist(hist_1)
axs[0, 1].hist(hist_2)
axs[1, 0].hist(hist_3)
axs[1, 1].hist(hist_4)
```
